'''Lantern''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{BlockLink|Lantern}}, a light source crafted from a torch and iron nuggets.
* {{BlockLink|Soul Lantern}}, a variant of the lantern crafted from soul torches and iron nuggets.
* {{BlockLink|Copper Lantern}}, a variant of the lantern crafted from copper torches and copper nuggets.
* {{BlockLink|Jack o'Lantern}}, a block crafted from a pumpkin.
* {{BlockLink|Sea Lantern}}, a block found in an ocean monument.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons''==
* {{DuItemLink|Soul Lantern}}, a {{MCD|soul}}-powered artifact used to summon {{MCD|soul wizard}}s.

== ''Minecraft: Story Mode'' ==
* {{SMItemLink|Sea Lantern}}
